Title: WixDeploymentExtension
Description: Extension support Biztalk Application deployment, Business Activity Monitor (BAM) Deployment and VSDBCMD based SQL deployment and SQLCMD script execution.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is an extension for deploying latest Microsoft technologies.
Currently the following are supported

Deploying BizTalk Applications (BizTalk Server 2010)
- Create BizTalk Server Application
- Add Resources to BizTalk Server Application
- Add BizTalk Server Application References.
- Deploy Bam Activity XMLs

Deploy Visual Studio Database Project (Visual Studio 2010)
- Deploy directly by simply specifying the output files.
- Ability to configure Sql Cmd Variables through configuration.


Run SqlCmd command (work in progress)
- Run SQL statements and SQL files as part of the deployment.
- Configure when to run the scripts by giving conditions.
- Set the SQLCMD variables with the using tags.
